numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Money has an effect on admission to an elite college.
2. The effect of money is not as big as the effect of legacy status.
3. I wonder how the authors calculated the advantage without legacy status.
4. This information has an impact on me.
5. This information has an impact on my community.
6. Most kids of my age look for colleges.
7. The graph helps these kids see the admissions advantage.
8. The graph shows an admissions advantage for an elite college if an applicant has legacy status.
